‚Äú‚û§ User Story Creation
Use Coachpilot's intelligent forms to define the goal, context, and persona of your user story. Input your parameters and let our AI craft a comprehensive and precise user story for you.

‚û§ Instant User Story Generation
Once your inputs are ready, a single click is all it takes. Tap the "Generate" button and watch as our AI synthesizes a user story tailored to your needs, saving you valuable time.

‚û§ Jira Embedded Integration
Integrate Coachpilot directly into your project management tools like Jira. Create, edit, and refine user stories without ever leaving your workflow.

‚û§ Guided User Story Craft
Not sure how to start? Our AI prompts guide you, ensuring clarity and precision in every story. You're not just getting a tool; you're getting a story assistant.

‚û§ Flexible Formats (coming soon)
Whether you're drafting epics, tasks, or specific user stories, Coachpilot molds to fit your specific requirements. The AI adjusts its output based on the context you provide.
